title: COVID-19 Update
content:
There will be no Worship Services, Connect Groups, or AWANA meeting at the church until further notice.
  • Pastor Erik Brewer will be teaching Connect Groups (Sunday School) via Facebook Live Sunday at 9:00 AM
  • Pastor Steve Fehrman will be preaching via Facebook Live on Sunday at 10:30 AM
  • Pastor Steve will also host a Facebook Live Bible Study on Wednesday evening at 7:00 PM
